description: This file defines a bottom navigation controller (`BottomNavController`) for managing the selected tab index, as well as a widget (`OceanBottomNavBar`) that renders a bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Dashboard, Consult, Records, and Profile. It is part of a Flutter frontend for healthcare management.

classes.name: BottomNavController
classes.description: A controller class extending ChangeNotifier to manage and notify changes to the selected bottom navigation tab index.

classes.name: OceanBottomNavBar
classes.description: A StatelessWidget rendering a Material 3 adaptive bottom navigation bar with four destinations for the app.

methods.name: BottomNavController.setIndex
methods.description: Sets the current index of the bottom navigation tab. If the new index is the same as the current, it does nothing; otherwise, updates and notifies listeners.

methods.name: OceanBottomNavBar.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the bottom navigation bar, including theme color scheme and destination icons with labels.
